Tv Show of Qingdao Galaxy International School

1.Competitors must take part in person and are not permitted to delegate to others.

 2.Information in the work declaration form can not be modified after the announcement of the shortlist for nationwide final competition. Works in finalists shall not be modified or replaced.

 3.Works of a foreign language should be presented and explained in mandarin (Excluding in necessary teaching and competing steps).

 4.The award-winning works in other competitions are not acceptable.

 5.All works must be created by the authors who shall confirm that they have exclusive copyrights for their works. Work content must be positive, should not violate national policies and legal rules and the length shall not be less than 30 seconds.
 Competitors shall not borrow/copy other person's works. Those who violate the above-mentioned rules, once found, will immediately invalidate their qualifications for competition joining and prize-winning. Any legal dispute thus incurred shall be borne by the authors themselves.
 All relevant units will be informed as well.

 6.Competitors agree that the organizing committee enjoys the use rights for their works and can exhibit and spread them in any form.
Resource is in preparation, Please try again later.
I have read and agree to the items mentioned above
Add to favorite in My Resources
Please refer to for more details
Real name should be within 20 characters

\t\t\t\tAs a new generation of intelligent teaching platform, LQWaWa provides characteristic and specialized courses such as English International, English Domestic, Minority Language, Basic Courses, etc. Supported by a great number of foreign and Chinese teachers with expertise, it fully utilizes the hottest webcast to offer an innovative study method, enabling a full followup of course preparation, live broadcast and review. It is really a best companion for K12 steudents and people going abroad. In addition, it allows teachers/students/parents to create diversified teaching resources including courses，coursewares, posts, tasks, etc. with text, image, video, audio or other multimedia elements and supports initiating discussion at any time. Relying on the diversified and three-dimensional teaching method, LQWaWa ensures a more effective and efficient learning experience in ease.
Copyright©2014-2017 Qingdao LQWAWA Information Technology Co., Ltd., All Rights Reserved
